prompt_final:
WORLD STYLE PACK (use consistently): Baseline look: retro shōnen anime look; 1980s–90s cel shading; clean, bold ink outlines; simple shadow shapes; minimal gradient use; dramatic rim light; hard-edged highlights on armor and hair; materials: matte white battle armor, worn leather straps, scuffed metal, dusty stone; atmosphere: red-brown sky haze, windblown grit, distant engine smoke, heat shimmer; palette: warm earth reds and oranges, pale armor whites, deep blue-black hair, occasional scouter green glow | Composition: treat each image like a comic panel: clear focal point, readable silhouettes; wide establishing shots for city/landscape scale; tight close-ups for emotion and tells; motion is readable: clean speed-lines implied by pose, not literal drawn text

Wide establishing shot: Vegeta City skyline, angular towers and landing pads, small ships lifting off with engine smoke, parade-ground geometry, red sky haze and heat shimmer, dust in the air, cinematic panel composition, anime cel shading, no text.

Constraints: no text, no watermark.
prompt_user: Wide establishing shot: Vegeta City skyline, angular towers and landing pads, small ships lifting off with engine smoke, parade-ground geometry, red sky haze and heat shimmer, dust in the air, cinematic panel composition, anime cel shading, no text.
